name: Solar System (itch) (Killuard)
description:
This first project is a Solar System simulation developed in the Michigan State University Game Design and Development course on Coursera.

Changes:

  1. Adjusted the camera positions.
  2. Created Planet prefab.
  3. Added a trail to the Planet prefab.
  4. Created all the missing planets for our solar system.
  5. Changed sun texture.
  6. Adjusted planet size and rotation speed.
